metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40316 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The H5P activity attempts report did not filter by groups, which in separate groups mode could reveal information to non-editing teachers about attempts/users in groups they should not have access to.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
